TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how a URL is converted to canonical form.

span.span: Specifies how a URL is converted to canonical form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举用于对非托管 Windows 函数 UrlCanonicalize 的调用。This enumeration is used in calls to the unmanaged Windows function UrlCanonicalize. 枚举值是在 Shlwapi 中定义的。The enumeration values are defined in Shlwapi.h. 可以组合这些标志。The flags can be combined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_BROWSER_MODE = int32(33554432)
URL_BROWSER_MODE = 33554432

summary.span: Defined to be the same as URL_DONT_ESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO.

span.span: Defined to be the same as URL_DONT_ESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_CONVERT_IF_DOSPATH = int32(2097152)
URL_CONVERT_IF_DOSPATH = 2097152

summary.span: Convert to a URL if in a dospath format.

span.span: Convert to a URL if in a dospath format.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_DONT_ESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO = int32(33554432)
URL_DONT_ESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO = 33554432

summary.span: Used only in conjunction with URL_ESCAPE_SPACES_ONLY to prevent the conversion of characters in the query (the portion of the URL following the first # or ?

span.span: Used only in conjunction with URL_ESCAPE_SPACES_ONLY to prevent the conversion of characters in the query (the portion of the URL following the first # or ?

summary.span: character encountered in the string).

span.span: character encountered in the string).

summary.span: This flag should not be used alone or combined with URL_ESCAPE_SEGMENT_ONLY.

span.span: This flag should not be used alone or combined with URL_ESCAPE_SEGMENT_ONLY.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_DONT_SIMPLIFY = int32(134217728)
URL_DONT_SIMPLIFY = 134217728

summary.span: Treat "/./" and "/../" in a URL string as literal characters, not as shorthand for navigation.

span.span: Treat "/./" and "/../" in a URL string as literal characters, not as shorthand for navigation.

URL_DONT_UNESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO = 33554432

summary.span: This flag should not be used alone or combined with URL_ESCAPE_SEGMENT_ONLY.

span.span: This flag should not be used alone or combined with URL_ESCAPE_SEGMENT_ONLY.

URL_ESCAPE_PERCENT = 4096

summary.span: Convert any occurrence of "%" to its escape sequence.

span.span: Convert any occurrence of "%" to its escape sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_ESCAPE_SEGMENT_ONLY = int32(8192)
URL_ESCAPE_SEGMENT_ONLY = 8192

summary.span: Indication that the URL contains only the section following the server component but preceding the query.

span.span: Indication that the URL contains only the section following the server component but preceding the query.

summary.span: All unsafe characters in the string are converted.

span.span: All unsafe characters in the string are converted.

summary.span: If a full URL is provided when this flag is set, all unsafe characters in the entire string are converted, including # and ?

span.span: If a full URL is provided when this flag is set, all unsafe characters in the entire string are converted, including # and ?

summary.span: characters.

span.span: characters.

summary.span: Combine this flag with URL_ESCAPE_PERCENT to include that character in the conversion.

span.span: Combine this flag with URL_ESCAPE_PERCENT to include that character in the conversion.

summary.span: This flag cannot be combined with URL_ESCAPE_SPACES_ONLY or URL_DONT_ESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO.

span.span: This flag cannot be combined with URL_ESCAPE_SPACES_ONLY or URL_DONT_ESCAPE_EXTRA_INFO.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_ESCAPE_SPACES_ONLY = int32(67108864)
URL_ESCAPE_SPACES_ONLY = 67108864

summary.span: Replace only spaces with escape sequences.

span.span: Replace only spaces with escape sequences.

summary.span: This flag takes precedence over URL_ESCAPE_UNSAFE, but does not apply to opaque URLs.

span.span: This flag takes precedence over URL_ESCAPE_UNSAFE, but does not apply to opaque URLs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.IE.Manager/URL_CANONFLAGS URL_ESCAPE_UNSAFE = int32(536870912)
URL_ESCAPE_UNSAFE = 536870912

summary.span: Replace unsafe characters with their escape sequences.

span.span: Replace unsafe characters with their escape sequences.

summary.span: Unsafe characters are those characters that may be altered during transport across the Internet, and include the <, >, ", #, {, }, |, \, ^, [, ], and ' characters.

span.span: Unsafe characters are those characters that may be altered during transport across the Internet, and include the <, >, ", #, {, }, |, \, ^, [, ], and ' characters.

summary.span: This flag applies to all URLs, including opaque URLs.

span.span: This flag applies to all URLs, including opaque URLs.

URL_FILE_USE_PATHURL = 65536

span.span: Use DOS path compatibility mode to create "file" Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs).

URL_INTERNAL_PATH = 8388608

span.span: Convert any occurrence of "#" to its escape sequence.

URL_NO_META = 134217728

span.span: Defined to be the same as URL_DONT_SIMPLIFY.

URL_PLUGGABLE_PROTOCOL = 1073741824

summary.span: Combine URLs with client-defined pluggable protocols, according to the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification.

span.span: Combine URLs with client-defined pluggable protocols, according to the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification.

summary.span: This flag does not apply to standard protocols such as ftp, http, gopher, and so on.

span.span: This flag does not apply to standard protocols such as ftp, http, gopher, and so on.

URL_UNESCAPE = 268435456

summary.span: Unescape any escape sequences that the URLs contain, with two exceptions.

span.span: Unescape any escape sequences that the URLs contain, with two exceptions.

summary.span: The escape sequences for "?" and "#" are not un-escaped.

span.span: The escape sequences for "?" and "#" are not un-escaped.

summary.span: If one of the URL_ESCAPE flags is also set, the two URLs are first un-escaped, then combined, then escaped.

span.span: If one of the URL_ESCAPE flags is also set, the two URLs are first un-escaped, then combined, then escaped.

URL_UNESCAPE_HIGH_ANSI_ONLY = 4194304

URL_UNESCAPE_INPLACE = 1048576

span.span: Convert escape sequences back into ordinary characters and overwrites the original string.

URL_WININET_COMPATIBILITY = -2147483648
